official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Halosulfuron-Methyl.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on methyl 5-(((4,6,-dimethoxy-2-pyrimidinyl)amino) carbonylaminosulfonyl) -3-chloro-1-methyl-1-H-pyrazole-4- carboxylate (halosulfuron-methyl).

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Halosulfuron-Methyl.
